SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Install the Einstein Personalization Data Kit from AppExchange

The Einstein Personalization data kit is a managed package. Install the managed package, and then configure it for your environment and users.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS
USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To install managed packages:	Download AppExchange Packages
In AppExchange, search for Salesforce Einstein Personalization.
Click Get It Now.
Click Install in Production.
Enter the requested information, agree to the terms and conditions, and then click Confirm and Install.
Enter the password that you were provided to participate in the restricted GA. If you don’t have a password, contact your Salesforce Support representative.
To review the package components, click View Components.
Select the user types that can access the package. See Determine Which Users Can Access a Package.
Click Install.

After the installation completes, deploy the included data streams, data models, and calculated insights.
